content.d: So this is... Rina-chan’s special drink...
Yup, it’s crafted especially for Karin-san.
What kind of drink is it? Is it something that’ll help me maintain my figure or make me grow taller?
...It’s... a drink mix that makes studying more fun... Kanata-san and Shioriko-chan said that it’d be good for you...
...Do you not want it? Rina-chan Board says, “Pout”......
No, no! It sounds good, really good! This might indeed be something I need! I’ll drink it! I will, okay!?
I’m glad...... Thanks, Karin-san. Love you.
